resp = client.security.create_api_key(
    name="my-other-api-key",
    metadata={
        "application": "my-application",
        "environment": {
            "level": 2,
            "trusted": True,
            "tags": [
                "dev",
                "staging"
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
